entry.title: Kyiv Hit by Drone Attacks as Russia Targets Infrastructure
entry.content: Russia launched a fresh wave of Iranian-made drones to strike central Kyiv, Ukrainian officials said, as Moscow presses a campaign attacking Ukraine’s energy infrastructure before the onset of winter.

entry.title: Xi Jinping's Ideological Ambition Darkens China's Economic Prospects
entry.content: Many economists predict slower growth, in part due to Xi’s focus on Communist Party control. He shows few signs of changing course on his priorities.
